name: You're Welcome at Our Table
description:
An interactive RPG, made in RPG Maker MV, where a student finds themself a victim of social isolation during lunch. Play as this character to find other students eating alone at lunch and to eventually make a safe space for all students to eat!

Game made in RPG Maker MV

Assets and tilesets are either stock from game or from Nicnubill, Alilali and kadokawa.

Concept art, project manager, programmer and level design: Alyssa Payne

Music/Composition: Jamie Wind Whitmarsh (A103 Productions)
